item.description:
Hey BOSSparkers!

We're back!  Details on the next event - RSVP NOW:

When: Tuesday, August 21, 2012 8-10 am - light breakfast
Where: MassChallenge offices
Who: Funded Funders:

-- Mike Rowsey, CEO Marlin Mobile
-- Justin Borgman, CEO Hadapt
-- Steven Gordon, Ph.D, CEO, Intelligent Bio-Systems, Inc.

What: Our panel of funded founders will talk about:

-- How they connected with potential funders
-- How they structured their funding
-- How their company story evolved over time
-- How long did it take to nail down funding
-- What they would do differently if they had to do it again
-- What recommendations do they have for others
-- What do you want to know? Bring your questions!

(Note: Hadapt secured a $9.5 million A round in October 2011.)

We'll open the doors at 8:00 am for networking and breakfast, and kick off the panel promptly at 9:00 am.  We must have your name on the list so we can check you in (and so we know how much coffee to order!) Accounting Management Solutions will be providing coffee and a light breakfast to get your day started right!

MassChallenge's offices are on the 14th floor, overlooking the harbor, in Boston's Innovation district (8-10 minute walk from South Station or take the Silver Line to Courthouse Station nearby.)
item.name: Funded Founders Panel
